message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to acquire a truly unique item. I'm thinking of a price of $1500000 for it. What are your thoughts?
I'm very interested in the product, but $1500000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Is that something we can work with?

I understand that $900000 is a bit of a stretch for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer you a price of $1200000, which is a significant discount from my initial offer. What do you think?

I appreciate the discount, Alice, but $1200000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $1050000. Is that something we can work with?

I see you're willing to compromise, Bob. I appreciate that. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $1200000 to $1050000, so I'll counter with $1150000. This is my best offer, but I'm willing to negotiate further if you're willing to meet me in the middle

I appreciate the compromise, Alice, but $1150000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $1075000. Is that something we can work with?

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $1150000 to $1075000, so I'll counter with $1112500. This is a fair price, considering the value of the product. What do you think?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $1125000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $1087500. However, I'm getting close to my maximum budget, so I'd appreciate it if we could meet at or below that price.

I understand you're getting close to your maximum budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $1112500 to $1087500, so I'll counter with $1095000. This is a fair price, considering the value of the product. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm really close to my maximum budget. I'll meet you halfway from $1095000 to $1087500, so I'll counter with $1092500. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on this price.
